body.name: EBODA Bluetooth Shower Speaker, Waterproof Portable Speakers IPX7 Floating, True Wireless Stereo BT 5.0 Speaker with Bass, 2000mAh LED Light for Shower, Pool, Beach, Gifts for Women- Red
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 45 mins
features: ♬【IP67 WATERPROOF BLUETOOTH SPEAKER &FLOATING】 Shower speaker is thoroughly resistant to water, dust and sand. You can get it wet, muddy, covered in snow, and then hand wash it when you go in. The water vapor in bathroom will never interfere with the sound quality of the waterproof speaker. its IP67 protection even withstands complete submersion in up to one meter of water for up to 30 minutes, and even float after taking a plunge.

♬【CRYSTAL CLEAR SOUND & POWERFUL BATTERY 】 Compact palm sized body, built high capacity 2000mAh battery in portable wireless speaker, support for music playback long (determined by volume ,led patterns and audio content of speaker played). The shower bluetooth speaker sound was nice and crisp, distortion-free at maximum volume 5W driver output for delivering full range and powerful sound and support A2DP.

♬【5 LED Light Patterns】Light up your life. You can enjoy the LED light show when you using the portable wireless bluetooth speaker listen music. Night Light Changing Wireless Speaker with 5 patterns of LED light let your life become more interesting. Our Cool LED Bluetooth Speaker can be as a gifts for men, women, your friend or kids.

♬【STABLE BLUETOOTH CONNECTION 】 Bluetooth 5.0 technology has a better and stable signal and high transmission rate ensure the reliability. EBODA Shower Bluetooth speaker supported to connect with all iOS Android devices, phone, computers and even echo Series, outstanding connection range of up to 33 feet and built-in microphone for hands free calling mean more flexibility for you .

♬【TRUE WIRELESS STEREO & ULTRA-PORTABLE】True wireless stereo technology support two waterproof speakers play music synchronously through a Bluetooth connection, form a wireless left and right channel system to deliver you true stereo sound. Portable bluetooth speaker with rugged rubber housing, built-in hook with a carabiner so you can hang the portable speaker on backpack, bicycles and anywhere you like, so it’s perfect for travel, riding, hiking, camping and more outdoor/ indoors activities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super durable, good quality sound, great buy
reviews.reviewText: Bought the red as a gift for husband in October 2022 - he brings it to work and uses it all the time, so I can attest that it is super durable and the battery life is enough for him to use often with a few charges in between. The sound quality - no complaints. I haven’t measured the exact battery life we get out of it because I ain’t got time for that, but overall we’re pretty pleased with the product. I think if I had to consider repurchasing for a guy I’d go for something bigger than this, as guys always seem to want more sound but it’s a great buy for a compact product and is nice for travel (it is round though and something square/flat will take up less space, but the hook means you can attach it onto a bag strap). My female friends like this speaker too, but for myself I got this slightly less expensive Altec one in 2019 (https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B013AOCFHI/ref=ppx_yo_dt_b_search_asin_title?ie=UTF8&th=1) which I like better as it is cuter and even more compact, has held up well for an even longer time but then I am not as rough with mine so hard to compare the durability of the two. Can recommend as to quality, it’s great for what it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I tell people to buy this speaker every possible chance I get
reviews.reviewText: This is the best speaker I have ever gotten. It has been doing really well in the shower, which is where I initially wanted it for.However, the sound quality is great, the connectivity is the absolute best I have ever seen for a device that uses Bluetooth (seriously -- even expensive hearing aids have nothing on this), and I love the easy controls and fun colors so I will move it around my apartment with me while I do work and chore stuff.The battery life is amazing. I have had this for a while and literally only charged it twice.Buy this speaker. You will not regret it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent sound that lasts
reviews.reviewText: I've had this for I think a year and I use it in the shower. Sound is great, nothing fancy but nice and loud and great Bluetooth functions that let you skip songs and such without touching your phone, easy to connect, and most importantly it's durable. I'm very happy with this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So far, so good with this speaker. My requirements were water resistant and loud enough for me to understand podcasts or audiobooks over the sound of my loud shower. It does that just fine. As an added bonus it does have rubber coating so hopefully that will help if I drop it in the shower or on the bathroom tiles.I’ve tried playing music with it & the base seemed decent for the size & cost of the speaker. It’s never going to be a Bose but I don’t need it to be for the shower or in my small kitchen.I didn’t really care about the lights feature. Kind of cool that they have several settings for different displays but TBH, I just leave them off. All you have to do is press the light button a few times to cycle through the setting until you get to lights off. It stays at that setting each time you turn the speaker on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Shower Symphony: EBODA Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker Review
reviews.reviewText: Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5)The EBODA Waterproof Bluetooth Shower Speaker has transformed my daily shower routine into an immersive audio experience. As a tech enthusiast who appreciates both functionality and durability, this compact speaker exceeded my expectations in more ways than one.Design and Durability: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5)The sleek and compact design of the EBODA speaker seamlessly fits into any bathroom setting. Its robust build quality ensures durability, and the IPX7 waterproof rating means it can handle the splashes and humidity of the shower environment with ease. The suction cup attachment securely adheres to shower walls, making it convenient to place the speaker at the perfect listening height.Sound Quality: ⚡⚡⚡⚡⚡ (5/5)For its size, the EBODA speaker delivers surprisingly rich and clear sound. Whether I'm enjoying my favorite tunes or catching up on podcasts, the audio quality remains impressive. The bass is surprisingly punchy, and the volume is more than sufficient to drown out the shower noise. It enhances the overall shower experience without any distortion.Bluetooth Connectivity: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5)Pairing the EBODA speaker with my devices is a breeze. The Bluetooth connectivity is reliable, with a decent range that allows me to keep my phone safely away from the water source. The connection remains stable, even in a steamy environment, ensuring uninterrupted playback.Battery Life: ⚡⚡⚡⚡⚡ (5/5)The battery life on this little powerhouse is impressive. I can use it for several showers before needing to recharge. The convenience of not having to worry about constantly charging the speaker adds to its appeal. The charging process is quick and hassle-free.User-Friendly Controls: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5)The simple and intuitive controls make the EBODA speaker user-friendly. The buttons are responsive and easy to navigate, allowing me to adjust volume, skip tracks, or answer calls without fumbling. The built-in microphone for hands-free calling is an excellent bonus feature.Versatility: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5)While designed for the shower, the EBODA speaker's versatility extends beyond the bathroom. Its portability makes it a great companion for outdoor activities, such as picnics or poolside gatherings. The durable construction ensures it can withstand various environments, making it a versatile addition to my audio gear.In conclusion, the EBODA Waterproof Bluetooth Shower Speaker has become an indispensable part of my daily routine. Its combination of durability, impressive sound quality, and user-friendly features make it a standout product in the realm of shower speakers. If you're looking to add a musical element to your shower or enhance your outdoor adventures, the EBODA speaker is a fantastic choice that delivers on all fronts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I can’t say enough about this speaker.•The sound quality is incredible• It’s completely waterproof in the shower and even in our lake.• The battery charges very quickly with the easy USB port and holds a charge longer then any other speaker we’ve owned, I’ve been using it on and off over the past 3 days for over 5 hours with no signs of the battery running low.• It connects to my Bluetooth quickly & easily which says a lot because I am not computer savvy at all.• The buttons are raised so it’s very easy to find them to make volume & other adjustments even when your eyes are full of soap.• The size and shape make it very easy to grip onto with wet hands.• And the lights make it so much fun and are extremely easy to adjust.And the very best of all is that my 7yr old grandson who really dislikes bathing & showering is now begging to take a shower with his Nana’s awesome “party speaker”.Great speaker that appears durable enough to last for many many years!

I got this for my shower. My laptop is in my living room so it has good enough range on the Bluetooth. Connects easily and immediately. No interruptions, sounds great! It can switch songs from the device to your laptop when I’m listening to YouTube or Spotify.
Pros:-1. Lights are good.2. Body is quite strong3. Sound is decent & not distortion.Cons:-1. Lights are not sinking with music.2. Sound is very low for outdoor listening.3. Not adequate bass.

The EBODA Bluetooth Shower Speaker has completely transformed my music experiences, combining superb sound quality, waterproof capabilities, and a touch of style. This portable speaker is a true game-changer for music enthusiasts and adventurers alike. First and foremost, the sound quality exceeded my expectations. Despite its compact size, this speaker delivers clear and dynamic audio that fills the air with music. Whether I'm lounging by the pool, camping under the stars, or taking a relaxing bath, the sound is rich, balanced, and surprisingly powerful. The waterproof feature adds a level of versatility that sets this speaker apart. Its ability to handle splashes, rain, and even float in water makes it ideal for poolside parties, beach outings, and aquatic adventures. The built-in LED light feature is a brilliant addition. Not only does it add a fun and lively element to gatherings, but it also enhances visibility in low-light settings. If you're seeking a portable speaker that effortlessly combines style and functionality, this speaker is a must-have for your next outing, relaxation session or travel experience.

Not super loud but works well. I use it at the office. On my paddle board. In my car for the kids. Battery life is good. Water proof. Only con is not suuuper loud but that's okay for what I use it for. Bought a 2nd one for my hubby to use on the worksite. He likes it because it hooks to his belt loop.

The media could not be loaded. Was intended to have music in the shower but now it’s used everywhere. Small but loud - great sound. Easy to change volume/songs/and colour. The battery lasts awhile and when it is low it tells you. Very pleased with this item!
